item.title: Rivian 因大众汽车 50 亿美元的 "信任投票 "投资而跃升
item.description: Rivian Automotive 周三盘前大涨 36%，原因是大众汽车（Volkswagen）的 50 亿美元投资为这家亏损的初创公司提供了更大的动力，以在放缓的电动汽车市场上扩大生产规模。【原文：Rivian Automotive surged 36% premarket on Wednesday after a $5 billion investment from Volkswagen offered the loss-making startup more firepower to scale production in a slowing electric-vehicle market.】

item.title: 印度进入摩根大通新兴市场债务指数的五件事
item.description: 从本周五开始，印度政府债券将逐步成为摩根大通广泛跟踪的新兴市场债务指数的一部分。【原文：India's government bonds will gradually become a part of JPMorgan's widely tracked emerging market debt index, beginning on Friday.】

item.title: 西南航空公司下调第二季度单位收入预期
item.description: 美国西南航空公司（Southwest Airlines）周三下调了第二季度每可用座位里程收入（RASM）的预期，理由是旅游需求不均衡，导致其股价在盘前交易中下跌了 9%。【原文：Southwest Airlines on Wednesday lowered its second-quarter forecast for revenue per available seat miles (RASM), a proxy for pricing power, citing uneven travel demand, sending its shares down 9% in premarket trading.】

item.title: 独家报道消息人士称，瑞银敦促瑞士政府澄清资本要求
item.description: 熟悉内情的消息人士称，瑞银正在推动瑞士政府澄清该行在收购瑞士信贷后还需要持有多少缓冲资本，因为人们担心谈判将拖延数月，令投资者感到不安。【原文：UBS is pushing the Swiss government to clarify how much more the bank will need to hold in capital buffers after buying Credit Suisse, amid concerns the talks will drag on for months, unnerving investors, sources familiar with the matter said.】

item.title: 美联储鲍曼：政策利率保持稳定，通胀率将下降
item.description: 美国联邦储备委员会理事米歇尔-鲍曼（Michelle Bowman）周三重申了她的基线观点，即 "在政策利率保持稳定的情况下，通胀率将进一步下降"，如果通胀率确实持续向 2% 迈进，"最终 "降息将是适当的。【原文：U.S. Federal Reserve Governor Michelle Bowman on Wednesday reiterated her baseline view that "inflation will decline further with the policy rate held steady," and that rate cuts will "eventually" be appropriate if inflation does move sustainably toward 2%.】

item.title: 纳斯达克、标准普尔 500 指数期货上涨，科技股复苏势头增强
item.description: 纳斯达克和 S&P 500 指数期货周三走高，原因是英伟达（Nvidia）和其他芯片股在本周关键的通胀数据公布前继续重拾升势，而联邦快递（FedEx）股价则因乐观的年度利润预测而飙升。【原文：Nasdaq and S&P 500 futures advanced on Wednesday as Nvidia and other chip stocks continued to regain momentum ahead of a key inflation reading this week, while FedEx shares soared on the back of an upbeat annual profit forecast.】

item.title: Blackstone 抢购英国酒店运营商 Village Hotels
item.description: 私募股权投资巨头 Blackstone 已同意收购英国酒店运营商 Village Hotels，该公司周三表示，由于酒店业的表现优于更广泛的商业地产市场，这是更多投资者进军酒店业的举措之一。【原文：Private equity giant Blackstone has agreed to buy British hotel operator Village Hotels, the company said on Wednesday, part of a wider investor push into the hospitality sector as it outperforms the broader commercial property market.】

item.title: 你今天过得更好吗？拜登和特朗普辩论时向选民提出的问题
item.description: 罗纳德-里根（Ronald Reagan）在 1980 年 10 月与民主党现任总统吉米-卡特（Jimmy Carter）的辩论中向选民提出的问题 "你们的生活比四年前好吗？"或许是总统辩论中最有名的一句话，当时高通胀严重打击了消费者的消费能力，并引发了对经济的普遍担忧。【原文：Perhaps the most famous one-liner in a presidential debate, Ronald Reagan's "Are you better off than you were four years ago?" question to voters in his match with Democratic incumbent Jimmy Carter in October 1980, came as high inflation pummeled consumers' spending power and captured a general malaise about the economy.】

item.title: 独家报道消息称博世有意收购家电制造商惠而浦
item.description: 据三位知情人士透露，德国工程集团罗伯特-博世公司（Robert Bosch GmbH）正在考虑竞购美国家电制造商惠而浦（Whirlpool），此举将提升其在白色家电市场的地位。【原文：German engineering group Robert Bosch GmbH is weighing a bid for U.S. appliances manufacturer Whirlpool , according to three people familiar with the matter, a move that would boost its position in the white goods market.】

item.title: 人工智能数据集授权公司成立行业组织
item.description: 用于人工智能系统训练的音乐、图像、视频和其他数据集的 OkSeven 内容授权销售商周三表示，他们已经成立了该行业的首个贸易集团。【原文：OkSeven content-licensing sellers of music, image, video and other datasets for use in training artificial intelligence systems have formed the sector's first trade group, they said on Wednesday.】

item.title: 尽管需求冷淡，美国原油进口量仍创两年新高
item.description: 美国上个月的原油进口量升至近两年新高，原因是炼油厂从加拿大和拉丁美洲攫取重质原油，加工成夏季驾车季节所需的燃料。【原文：U.S. crude oil imports last month rose to a nearly two-year high as refiners scooped up heavy crudes from Canada and Latin America to process into fuels for summer driving season.】

item.title: 早间竞价：利率忧虑卷土重来；人民币和日元再度走软
item.description: Mike Dolan 展望美国和全球市场的未来一天【原文：A look at the day ahead in U.S. and global markets from Mike Dolan】

item.title: 石油巨头并购时代过后，资产出售问题迫在眉睫
item.description: 随着 25 年来最大规模的能源巨头合并浪潮接近监管审查的尾声，美国石油和天然气公司在未来几年可能面临出售约 270 亿美元资产以资助投资者的艰难抉择。【原文：U.S. oil and gas companies could face an uphill struggle to sell about $27 billion of assets to fund investor payouts over the next few years as the biggest wave of energy megamergers in 25 years nears the end of regulatory reviews.】

item.title: 监管机构称大众将召回超过 27.1 万辆美国汽车
item.description: 美国汽车安全监管机构周三表示，由于线路故障可能导致前排乘客安全气囊在座椅被占用时失效，大众汽车将在美国召回超过27.1万辆汽车。【原文：Volkswagen is recalling over 271,000 vehicles in the United States due to a wiring fault that may deactivate front passenger air bags when the seat is occupied, the U.S. auto safety regulator said on Wednesday.】

item.title: 独家：消息人士称，现代汽车印度首次公开募股银行将以 4000 万美元的费用迎来该国第二大发薪日
item.description: 三位消息人士称，为韩国现代汽车公司在印度上市提供咨询的银行将获得高达 4000 万美元的费用，这在银行通常难以赚钱的市场上是一笔意外之财，因为客户注重成本，而且大宗交易较少。【原文：Banks advising South Korean automaker Hyundai on its India IPO are set to make as much as $40 million in fees, three sources said, a windfall in a market where banks typically struggle to make money given cost-conscious clients and fewer big deals.】

item.title: 丰田因侧帘式安全气囊故障召回超过 14.5 万辆美国汽车
item.description: 美国国家公路交通安全管理局（U.S. National Highway Traffic Safety Administration）周三表示，丰田将在美国召回145254辆汽车，原因是这些汽车的侧帘式安全气囊可能会不正常展开。【原文：Toyota is recalling 145,254 vehicles in the U.S. over side curtain airbags that may deploy improperly, the U.S. National Highway Traffic Safety Administration said on Wednesday.】

item.title: 美国联邦航空局通过 13 架波音 757-200 型美国飞机的适航指令
item.description: 美国联邦航空管理局（FAA）表示，由于有报告称盥洗室服务面板内部和周围的结构出现裂缝，该局将对 13 架美国注册的波音 757-200 飞机采用新的适航指令。【原文：The Federal Aviation Administration (FAA) said it is adopting a new airworthiness directive for 13 Boeing 757-200 airplanes of U.S. registry over reports of cracking in the structure in and around the lavatory service panel.】

item.title: 富裕国家债权国俱乐部认为，随着债务违约现象逐渐减少，趋势正在发生变化
item.description: 富裕债权国巴黎俱乐部周三在其2023年度报告中说，四年来笼罩全球经济的债务危机风险正开始消退。【原文：The debt crisis risk that has overshadowed the global economy for four years is beginning to recede, the Paris Club of rich creditor nations said in its 2023 annual report on Wednesday.】

item.title: 分析师称日本 GDP 可能大幅下调，影响货币政策
item.description: 一些分析师表示，日本第一季度国内生产总值（GDP）罕见的意外修正可能导致大幅下调，从而可能影响央行的经济增长预测及其下一次加息的时机。【原文：A rare unscheduled revision to Japan's first-quarter gross domestic product (GDP) may lead to a sharp downgrade, possibly affecting the central bank's growth forecasts and the timing of its next interest rate hike, some analysts say.】

item.title: 50 亿美元 Rivian 交易后大众汽车股价下跌
item.description: 欧洲最大的汽车制造商大众汽车公司周三早盘股价下跌 1.4%，此前该公司表示将投资高达 50 亿美元，作为与电动汽车制造商 Rivian 成立合资企业计划的一部分。【原文：Shares in Volkswagen , Europe's largest carmaker, fell 1.4% in early trade on Wednesday after saying it would invest up to $5 billion as part of a planned joint venture with electric vehicle maker Rivian .】

item.title: 好莱坞工会与顶级电影公司达成薪酬和人工智能使用协议
item.description: 代表好莱坞电影和电视工作人员的一个工会周二表示，该工会已与各大电影公司达成一项为期三年的临时协议，其中包括商定的加薪和对人工智能（AI）使用的防范措施。【原文：A union representing Hollywood film and television crew said on Tuesday it has reached a tentative three-year deal with major studios that includes agreed-on pay hikes and guardrails against the use of artificial intelligence (AI).】

item.title: 西捷航空收到工会第二次罢工通知
item.description: Westjet 周三表示，该公司已收到代表其维修工程师的飞机机械师兄弟会（AMFA）的第二次罢工通知，而就在几天前，该工会撤销了罢工通知，双方同意重返谈判桌。【原文：Westjet said on Wednesday that it has received a second strike notice from the Aircraft Mechanics Fraternal Association (AMFA), representing its maintenance engineers, just days after the union rescinded its strike notice and both parties agreed to return to the bargaining table.】

item.title: 政治与英镑：英国大选如何左右英镑走势
item.description: 反对党工党有望在大选中取得压倒性胜利，英镑随之反弹，但英镑的未来取决于下届政府能否说服胆怯的投资者，让他们相信其修复停滞经济的计划是可信的。【原文：Britain's pound has bounced ahead of an expected landslide election win for the opposition Labour Party but the currency's future depends on the next government convincing skittish investors that its plans to fix a stagnant economy are credible.】

item.title: 腾讯游戏《地下城与勇士》称霸中国移动下载榜
item.description: 行业数据显示，腾讯控股有限公司新推出的《地下城与勇士》（DnF Mobile）开局势头强劲，在中国苹果 iOS 平台的收入排行榜上占据了近一个月的榜首位置。【原文：Tencent Holdings Ltd's newly launched "Dungeon & Fighter" (DnF Mobile) has got off to a strong start, dominating top-grossing charts on Apple's iOS platform in China for nearly a month, industry data showed.】

item.title: 苏黎世保险 6 亿美元收购 AIG 旅游业务
item.description: 苏黎世保险周三宣布斥资 6 亿美元收购 AIG 的全球个人旅行保险和援助业务。【原文：Zurich Insurance on Wednesday announced a $600 million deal to buy AIG's global personal travel insurance and assistance business.】

item.title: 聚焦：中国白酒制造商努力让西方人尝到白酒的滋味
item.description: 由于国内销售放缓，中国白酒制造商正在重新配制这种火热的谷物液体，以吸引更广泛的客户群，包括纽约、洛杉矶和伦敦的鸡尾酒饮用者。【原文：Makers of the Chinese liquor baijiu are reformulating the fiery grain liquid to appeal to a wider client base, including cocktail drinkers in New York, Los Angeles and London, as sales at home slow.】

item.title: 中国开发商世茂清算听证会延期至 7 月 31 日
item.description: 中国房地产开发商世茂集团在周三提交的一份文件中表示，由于该公司再次延长了债权人就债务重组计划的最后期限，针对该公司的清算案已延期至7月31日。【原文：A liquidation case against Chinese property developer Shimao Group has been adjourned to July 31 as it has again extended a deadline for creditors in relation to a debt restructuring plan, the company said in a filing on Wednesday.】

item.title: 早间竞价谨慎市场抑制科技热情
item.description: 安库尔-班纳吉（Ankur Banerjee）对欧洲和全球市场未来一天的展望【原文：A look at the day ahead in European and global markets from Ankur Banerjee】

item.title: 美国通胀数据公布前投资者警惕，亚洲股市震荡
item.description: 周三，亚洲股市在波澜不惊的早盘交易中踯躅不前，因为市场正在为关键的美国通胀数据做准备，而日元则徘徊在每美元 160 美元的水平附近，使交易商对日本当局的新一轮干预保持警惕。【原文：Asian stocks stuttered in choppy early trade on Wednesday as markets braced for a key U.S. inflation reading, while the yen lurked just shy of 160 per dollar level, keeping traders on alert for another round of intervention by Japanese authorities.】

item.title: 美元走稳使日元濒临 160 点
item.description: 周三美元坚挺，徘徊在 160 日元关口的悬崖边上，因为投资者转为谨慎，并为本周末公布的美国物价数据倒计时。【原文：The dollar was firm on Wednesday and trading on the precipice of the 160 yen barrier as investors turned cautious and counted down to the release of U.S. price data at the end of the week.】
